column2: "Gahahaha! At long last, I was able to truly cut loose in battle and fulfil my cold steel heart's desires."

"Coming to you was the right move after all.
...Thanks."

"Ash wants to go back to Ragol as soon as possible...
But I couldn't care less where I am."
"The prey I boarded Pioneer II to chase is lost to me forever, and my purpose with him. I have no reason to go back."

"But here, I've found a new purpose...
To hunt the one they call the Guardian of ARKS... Heheh."
